DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare the effectiveness in treatment of chronic blepharitis either with a phospholipid liposome suspension compared to a conventional therapy recommendation using diluted baby shampoo.
DOC.brief_title: Blephacura Versus Baby Shampoo to Treat Blepharitis
DOC.criteria: patients with blepharitis 100 eyes of 100 patients (50 patients treated with Blephacura, 50 patients treated with diluted baby shampoo) The ratio of female / male is not involved. all patients that are not included in the group of inclusion criteria
